string.text: Find the Wish Granter
The Wish Granter is rumoured to be buried deep within Chernobyl NPP. I must find it.
Meet with Sidorovich
Sidorovich in Cordon is known to give assistance to new stalkers in the Zone.
Meet Colonel Petrenko
I should report to Colonel Petrenko to receive my mission.
Meet Lukash
Lukash, the leader of Freedom, asked to speak with me.
Meet Cold
I should meet with Cold in the Clear Sky base as soon as I can.
Meet Professor Sakharov
Professor Sakharov has an assignment for me.
Meet Dushman
I should talk to Dushman.
Meet Colonel Kuznetsov
I must report to Colonel Kuznetsov.
Meet Sultan
Sultan wants to meet with me.
Meet Rabbit
I shall seek guidance from the wise Rabbit.
Meet Stribog
I shall seek Stribog to receive my mission.
Meet with Sidorovich
Sidorovich in Cordon is my next destination.
Meet with Xenotech
Xenotech in Cordon is my next destination.
Meet with Beard
Beard aboard the Skadovsk is my next destination.
Meet with Noah
Noah in Zaton is my next destination.
Meet with Colonel Petrenko
Colonel Petrenko in Rostok is my next destination.
Meet with Mangun
Mangun in Rostok is my next destination.
Meet with Lukash
Lukash in the Military Warehouses is my next destination.
Meet with Loki
Loki in Yanov Station is my next destination.
Meet with Cold
Cold in the Great Swamp is my next destination.
Meet with Librarian
Librarian in the Great Swamp is my next destination.
Meet with Professor Sakharov
Professor Sakharov in Yantar is my next destination.
Meet with Tukarev
Tukarev in Jupiter is my next destination.
Meet with Dushman
Dushman in Dead City is my next destination.
Meet with Hog
Hog in Dead City is my next destination.
Meet with Colonel Kuznetsov
Colonel Kuznetsov in Agroprom is my next destination.
Meet with Lieutenant Kirilov
Lieutenant Kirilov in Agroprom is my next destination.
Meet with Sultan
Sultan in Dark Valley is my next destination.
Meet with Olivius
Olivius in Dark Valley is my next destination.
Meet with Rabbit
Rabbit in Pripyat is my next destination.
Meet with Cleric
Cleric in Pripyat is my next destination.
Meet with Stribog
Stribog in the Red Forest is my next destination.
Meet with Dazhbog
Dazhbog in the Red Forest is my next destination.
Meet with Olivar
Olivar in the Outskirts is my next destination.
Meet with Griffith
Griffith in the Outskirts is my next destination.
Meet with Vector
Vector in Zaton is my next destination.
Meet with Klenov
Klenov in Jupiter is my next destination.
Procure %s
A fellow stalker asked me to bring him %s.
I'm running low on supplies. If you happen to have any on-hand or are willing to bring me some, I would be very grateful.
I'm low on %ss. Have some on you? Come find me if you get your hands on any.
Great, man! Thanks!
Procure %s
I was asked to find %s, by a fellow stalker.
Shit, man. Can you do me a huge favour? I'm running low on supplies. Can you help me out?
I'm low on %ss. Have some on you? Come find me if you get your hands on any.
Awesome, man. Thanks!
Procure %s
Find %s for a bandit.
You wanna to swap some loot?
I've got some good shit I can give you if you can find me some %ss.
Great man, thanks!
Procure %s
Find %s for a soldier.
You have any supplies you want to trade?
Tell you what: I'll trade you some extra ammo I've got if you can get me some %ss.
Great man, thanks!
Bring %s to Monolith Member
One of my brothers is ill and requires %s.
I must be strong to serve the Monolith well but I confess my strength is weakening. Can you help me, brother?
My brother, I am very ill. Cleric has graciously offered to pray for me but I'm pretty sure I just need %ss. Please bring me some.
Thank you my brother. May the glory of the Monolith shine upon you.
Find %s for a Merc
I was asked to find %s, by a Mercenary.
Can you do me a huge favour? I'm running low on supplies. Can you help me out?
I'm low on %ss. Come find me if you get your hands on any.
Thanks!
Find a Reliable %s
A stalker needs a reliable %s in perfect condition.
Yeah, my stash was looted, and I lost my favourite rifle. Can you help me find a new one?
I'm looking for a reliable %s. I loved that rifle. If you can find me one in good condition, I'll pay you a premium for it.
Thank you, stalker! Here is what I owe you. Now, off to hunt that damn fracture...
Find a Reliable %s
Procure a reliable %s.
This rifle I was issued is shit. I need one that won't jam on me in every firefight. Can you find a new one for me?
Get me a reliable %s. I'll make it worth your while.
Excellent! She's a beauty. Here, take this for your trouble.
Straw Purchase
A bandit needs an untraceable %s, no questions asked.
Listen, I need a rifle that can't be traced back to me. You know what I mean? You willing to help me out with this?
I need an untraceable %s. Buy it, steal it, loot it, whatever you gotta do; just get me one. I'll pay you double what it's worth.
Great! Here's what I promised you. And you never met me, got it?
Find a Reliable %s for Merc
Procure a reliable %s for a Mercenary.
This rifle I was issued is shit. I need one that won't jam on me in every firefight. Can you find a new one for me?
Get me a reliable %s. I'll make it worth your while.
Excellent! She's a beauty. Here, take this for your trouble.
Find a Reliable %s for Military
Procure a reliable %s for Military.
This rifle I was issued is shit. I need one that won't jam on me in every firefight. Can you find a new one for me?
Get me a reliable %s. I'll make it worth your while.
Excellent! She's a beauty. Here, take this for your trouble.
Find the %s Artefact
A fellow stalker is offering a reward in exchange for a %s artefact.
Are you any good at artefact hunting?
If you happen to find the "%s" artefact, let me know. I have a very nice reward I think you'll like.
Finally! You don't know how long I've been searching for this. Here. This is your reward.
Find the %s Artefact
A soldier is offering a rifle in exchange for the %s artefact.
Hey, listen, man. I know this is against regulations, but I'm going to be rotating home soon, and I want to bring back a souvenir. You think you can find an artefact for me?
I want to get the "%s" artefact. If you can find me one I'll give you my rifle.
Awesome! Here's what I promised you. Don't let the commander know I have this.
Procure %s
A stalker has a special recipe for preparing mutant meat and needs %s brought to him.
Man, you ever tried mutant meat? A lot of guys won't touch it unless they're starving, but personally I love it. You any good at hunting?
If you can get me a few good cuts of %s, I'll make it worth your while. Mmm... I'm drooling just thinking about it.
Yes! I'm going to eat good tonight! Thank you, stalker. Here is your payment. Oh, and here: I have some ammo that doesn't fit my rifle. You can have it.
%s Stew
A Bandit has a special recipe for preparing mutant meat and needs %s brought to him.
Man, you ever tried mutant meat? A lot of guys won't touch it unless they're starving but personally I love it. You any good at hunting?
If you can get me a few good cuts of %s I'll make it worth your while. Mmm... I'm drooling just thinking about it.
Yes! I'm going to eat good tonight! Thanks man, here is your payment and a little loot for ya.
Collect %s Tissue Sample
An Ecologist needs a tissue sample from a %s.
I'm researching certain mutants in the area. I need someone to collect a tissue sample for me.
If you could hunt one down for me, I need a sample of %s brought back to me. I can pay you for your trouble and, of course, the considerable risk involved.
Thank you, ser. This will help immensely in my research.
Collect %s
A Freedomer has asked me to collect %s.
Hey, man, can you gather some Duty scum patches for me? That'll make me sleep easier.
Hey, man, can you gather some Duty scum patches for me? That'll make me sleep easier.
Maximum respect, bro! Hold on to this artefact.
Collect %s
A Dutyer has asked me to collect %s.
You feel like taking out a few anarchists? There have been too many of them lately. Bring me their patches as evidence, will you?
You feel like taking out a few anarchists? There have been too many of them lately. Bring me their patches as evidence, will you?
Good job, man. Here, take this artefact before someone sees us.
Collect %s
A stalker has asked me to collect %s.
Hello brother, want to kill some bastards? You give me their sweet little patches, and I'll give you an artefact. What do you say?
Hello brother, want to kill some bastards? You give me their sweet little patches, and I'll give you an artefact. What do you say?
Thank you, brother, friend and helper. Here's your artefact.
Collect %s
A bandit has asked me to collect %s.
Hey, boy. I have some work for you. There's too many punks out there interfering with our business. Whack some of them and return their patches to me, will you?
Hey, boy. I have some work for you. There's too many punks out there interfering with our business. Whack some of them and return their patches to me, will you? I need %ses.
Good job, man. My respect and artefact to you.
Gather %s for Wanderers
Someone asked me to find and bring %s to him.
Me and my mates have been preparing for a long trip into the Zone. We could use more equipment, though.
Me and my mates have been preparing for a long trip into the Zone. We could use more equipment, though. Can you get some %ss for us?
Thanks! Here's some money for your help.
Collect %s
Someone asked me to find and bring %s to him.
My squad is about to head over to other parts of the Zone. Thinking of it, we can always make use of extra equipment for bad days. How about you get us some %ss and I give you something in return?
My squad is about heading over the other parts of the Zone. Thinking of it, we can always make use of extra equipment for bad days.
Oh man! My pals will be happy. Here, take these. You did a nice job.
Collect %s
Someone asked me to find and bring the %s to him.
See this old crappy equipment I have? It's getting worn slowly, and I was lazy enough to ignore it. I need to repair it as soon as possible.

See this old crappy equipment I have? It's getting worn slowly, and I was lazy enough to ignore it. I need to repair it as soon as possible. Can you get me some %ss? I will give you something nice in return.
Thanks! Here's the payment for your help.
Find %s
Someone needs to upgrade his outfit, he asked me to find and bring the %s upgrade kit.

The local mechanic informed me that he's looking for specific equipment in order to improve my outfit as requested. Apparently mechanics nowadays ask for the money and tools at once. You know what's even better? I had no luck in finding this shit so far...

The local mechanic informed me that he's looking for specific equipment in order to improve my outfit as requested. Apparently mechanics nowadays ask for the money and tools at once. You know what's even better? I had no luck in finding this shit so far... Help me find the %s upgrade kit and I will make sure that you get paid well.
Fantastic! I was waiting for this. Here, a nice payment for your trouble.
Find %s
Someone needs to upgrade his gun, he asked me to find and bring the %s upgrade kit.
You see this rusty gun over here? It's time to give it a special treatment. Bring me tools for it and I will pay you well.
You see this rusty gun over here? It's time to give it a special treatment. Bring me the %s upgrade for it and I will pay you well.
Fantastic! I was waiting for this. Here, a nice payment for your trouble.
Search and Rescue
A stalker's buddy was kidnapped by a gang of bandits. He asked me to try and rescue him.
I could really use some help, man. My friend was mugged and taken hostage by some bandits. I really don't know what I should do. Do you think you can help me out and save my friend?
You did it! Thank you, stalker! It's good to see my friend back and alive. Here, for your trouble.
Search and Rescue
I've been tasked to rescue a member of Duty who is being held hostage.
Stalker, our comrade was wounded and taken hostage! I'm in desperate need of someone capable enough to stage a rescue operation. Do you think you can help us out and save our friend?
Thank you, stalker. It's good to see you saved our comrade! Here, for your trouble.
Search and Rescue
I've been tasked to rescue a member of Freedom who is being held hostage.
Stalker, our comrade was wounded and taken hostage! I'm in desperate need of someone capable enough to stage a rescue operation. Do you think you can help us out and save our friend?
You did it! Thank you, stalker! It's good to see my friend back and alive. Here, for your trouble.
Search and Rescue
Rescue an Ecologist from a group of bandits.
Yes, please help! One of my colleagues was kidnapped. Can you help rescue him?
Thank you, stalker. It's good to see my colleague back! Please accept this as a reward.
Reverse Bounty Hunt
A stalker needs a bounty taken off his head.
Yes, help me, brother! Some bastard has put a price on my head. Take care of him for me, and I will pay you double the bounty he has on me.
Oh, thank you, stalker! Here's your payment. I can finally sleep for the first time in days!
Revenge Killing
A stalker wants me to avenge the death of his comrade.

A bandit snuck into our camp last night and murdered my friend in cold blood. We can't let this kind of scum keep breathing. Kill him for me, stalker. In return, I'll give you my slain comrade's rifle.
Thank you stalker, you are a good warrior. Join me in a drink to my fallen brother.
Glory Kill
A fellow soldier has bet that I can't assassinate a high-value target.

What, are you trying to climb the ranks or something? Tell you what, hotshot: I happen to know the location of a certain high-value target the brass wants eliminated. I'll bet you can't even get close to him.
For real? You really did it? Damn, if I though you had any chance I never would have made this bet. Well, a deal's a deal.
Subcontractor
I have taken over a contract killing.
I do, actually. I've taken on a few too many jobs. You want to take over one of my contracts for me? I'll give you most of the bounty on it.
Great job. Here's the money I owe you.
Redemption
A Monolith brother was defeated by an infidel. I must destroy the unbeliever, lest anyone begin to think the Monolith are not to be feared.

My brother, Rabbit has asked of me that I slay one of the infidels for the good of the Monolith. I fear I have failed him, as I was not able to get to the target. Will you not complete my task and redeem my failure?
You have done well. It is an honour to serve the almighty Monolith alongside you.
Bandit Subcontractor
I have taken over a contract killing for a bandit.
I've taken on a few too many jobs. You want to take over one of my contracts for me? I'll give you most of the bounty on it.
Thanks. Here's the money I owe you.
Eliminate Enemy Forces
The enemy has been spotted in the area. I must engage the infidels in battle for the good of the Monolith.
My brother, we have sighted the enemy in the area. We are going to alert our brothers to do battle. Go there now. Destroy them.
You have done well, my brother.
Scouting Expedition
I've been sent to scout the area where enemy forces have been sighted. I am to engage any enemy encountered.
There are reports of enemy activity in the neighbouring area, and our squad is tasked with engaging them. I'm looking for someone who is willing to scout ahead in preparation for our assault.
Excellent! Well done.
Clear the Research Area
A local faction has been harassing a scientist. He has asked me to clear them out of the area so he may conduct his research.

There is an area that I must conduct some important research on but there is a group of squatters who have moved in there, and they shoot at me anytime I go near there. I must perform this research stalker. Can you convince them to move along?
Thank you stalker you have aided me immensely. Please take this as a token of my gratitude.
Push Back the Monolith Incursion
Freedom has spotted Monolith stalkers near this location. I must prevent the Monolith from further encroaching on this area, or they may bring reinforcements of their own.

Hey, you’ll never believe this. When I, uh, came by this area during my patrol, I spotted some Monolith stalkers not too far from here. I must radio Lukash and his boys about this. In the meantime, can you keep an eye on the Monolith for me? I’d help you out, but I’ve got a severe hangover - I mean, uh, headache, so there might be a psy-field around that’s getting to me.

I just told you to keep an eye on them, what the fuck? Lukash told me he was sending out some reinforcements, but I guess they aren’t needed anymore. Oh, and he wanted me to give you this. Now, shoo! If that’s what you do to stalkers you’re keeping an eye on, I don’t want you anywhere near me! I’ve got a bottle, uh, a patrol to resume, anyways. So long, stalker.
Interdict Enemy Forces
I've been asked to intercept the enemy forces moving in on the area.
Bandits are moving in on the area. I'm going to alert the commander. Hold them off until I get back.
Outstanding! You are a fine soldier.
Eliminate Dangerous Mutants for Duty
Eliminate dangerous mutants in the area for the Duty faction.
We can't have so much dangerous mutant activity in the area, someone's going to get killed. Head out there and thin out the herd a bit.
Well done, here's your reward.
Eliminate Dangerous Mutants
Eliminate dangerous mutants in the area.
I was just attacked by a pack of mutants. I'll show you where they are, take them out before they kill somebody.
Thank you, please take this as a reward.
Eliminate Dangerous Mutants for Monolith
Eliminate dangerous mutants in the area for the Monolith.
There are dangerous mutants in the area. They have killed one of our brothers. Go eliminate them.
You have done well, my brother.
Search the Stash
A stalker has given the location of a good stash. If it contains a PDA, he is offering a reward.
I know where someone hid a good stash. If you find a PDA in there bring it to me, I'll pay you for it. Anything else you find is yours.
Thank you stalker!
Drug Runner
A Freedomer needs his latest shipment delivered.

Hey man, a shipment of, ah, 'medical supplies' dropped off somewhere recently. Could you pick it up and bring it here? It's a little out-of-the-way, but you shouldn't have much trouble. Want to make some extra cash for a good cause?

Haha, nice! You made it. Thanks a bunch, man. Me and the boys have a lot of ‘injuries’ we need to take care of, so you’re right on fuckin’ time. And I hope you didn’t try to sample anything, that shit is too hardcore for most stalkers to handle anyways. Alright, man, here. You have my thanks.
Retrieve Documents for Clear Sky
A Clear Sky member needs his documents returned to him.
I have some important documents that I stashed away when I was attacked by mutants. I dread to go back there. If you can you get them for me, I'll gladly pay you.
Thank you stalker!
Contact Lost
Stalker asked to find a PDA for him.
Hey, man, can you help me? My PDA's been malfunctioning recently. I really need a replacement quick.
Hey, man, can you help me? My PDA's been malfunctioning recently. I really need a replacement quick. Get back to me asap, okay?
Oh, thank you, man. Take this.
I'm afraid my PDA's been malfunctioning recently. I can't work properly with faulty equipment and I can't really wait for another shipment. Please find me a new model, okay?
Oh, thank you. Take this as a reward.
Deliver the Package
I have been tasked by $comm to deliver $item_1 to his friend, but I've dropped it somewhere. I should retrieve it.
I have been tasked by $comm to deliver $item_1 to his friend.

I have an important package that I'm supposed to deliver to my friend. Since I'm stuck here doing my job, I can't leave the place anytime soon. Interested in delivering the package to him? He will take care of your payment.
Thanks...
Hey, I got something for you. It's from your friend, $name.
About time... Thanks man. I'll let my friend know. In the meantime, here's something for your trouble.
Deliver the Package
I have been tasked by $comm to deliver $item_1 to his friend, but I've dropped it somewhere. I should retrieve it.
I have been tasked by $comm to deliver $item_1 to his friend.
Interested in delivering this small package to my colleague? I can't leave this place anytime soon, and he really needs it. I will contact him to expect your visit and pay for your trouble.
Thanks...
Hey, I got something for you. It's from your colleague, $name.
I got a call from him, thank you. Please, accept this reward for your trouble.
Deliver the Package
I have been tasked by $comm to deliver $item_1 to his friend, but I've dropped it somewhere. I should retrieve it.
I have been tasked by $comm to deliver $item_1 to his friend.

Alright, listen, see this package? I want it to be delivered to my whiny friend. He won't stop calling me about this shit. If it wasn't for my job in this place, I'd go and shove it up his ass. Take it to him and ask for your payment.
Thanks...
Hey, I got something for you. It's from your pal, $name.
So the bastard has received my messages, finally!\n \nOh, about your payment... Let's see... here, take this. You've done a good job, man.
Anomalous Study
$comm asked me to help him study an anomaly field, but I need to retrieve the $item_1 that I lost first.
$comm asked me to help him study an anomaly field.\nI'll need to head to the marked location.
$comm asked me to help him study an anomaly field.\nI can take measurements using the $item_1.
$comm asked me to help him study an anomaly field.\nI can now return to him with the $item_1 and recorded results.

Professor Kalancha has tasked me to study an anomalous field. If only I didn't have several important tasks already. Tell you what, why don't you take my device and go there to take the measurements for me? I'll pay for your trouble.
You've got the measurements? Great, here's your reward.
Anomalous Study
$comm asked me to help him study an anomaly field, but I need to retrieve the $item_1 that I lost first.
$comm asked me to help him study an anomaly field.\nI'll need to head to the marked location.
$comm asked me to help him study an anomaly field.\nI'll need to use the $item_1 to take measurements.
$comm asked me to help him study an anomaly field.\n I can now return to him with the $item_1 and recorded results.

As a matter of fact, I do. We've got reports regarding peculiar anomalous activity. I need someone to take measurements and bring back the results. \nI've got the right device for the job, it was designed to endure harsh environmental conditions, and collect accurate data despite the interference. \nWill you do it?
Fantastic! You've done us a great service. Here, please accept this.
Lost Signal ($freq MHz)
I have been tasked by $comm to trace his missing squad, but $item_1 is required to search.
I have been tasked by $comm to trace his missing squad and find out what happened to them.\nI should head over to $map.

I have been tasked by $comm to trace his missing squad and find out what happened to them.\nI'll need to use the $item_1 and set up the frequency to $freq MHz. Then, I'll need to search around for a good signal.
I have been tasked by $comm to trace his missing squad and find out what happened to them.\nI'll need to retrieve the $item_2 I found.
I have been tasked by $comm to trace his missing squad and find out what happened to them.\n I should return to him with my findings.

There's a situation I urgently need help with. A few days ago my squad was sent on a job, but I lost track of them when they were on their way back. They vanished without a trace! I need you to go find them, or at least any clues about what happened. \nYou have an RF receiver, right? We used to communicate with such a device. You can use it to find them.
Poor guys... the PDA contains records of their final moments. Seems like an ambush. Thank you. Here's your reward.
Procure %s
If I find %s for a renegade, he'll be willing to swap it for something valuable of his own.
You wanna swap some loot?
I've got some good shit I can give you if you can find me some %ss.
Great man, thanks!
Straw Purchase
A renegade needs an untraceable %s, no questions asked.
Listen, I need a rifle that can't be traced back to me. You know what I mean? You willing to help me out with this?
I need an untraceable %s. Buy it, steal it, loot it, whatever you gotta do; just get me one. I'll pay you double what it's worth.
Great! Here's what I promised you. And you never met me, got it?
%s Stew
A Renegade has a special recipe for preparing mutant meat and needs %s brought to him.
Man, you ever tried mutant meat? A lot of guys won't touch it unless they're starving, but personally I love it. You any good at hunting?
If you can get me a few good cuts of %s I'll make it worth your while. Mmm... I'm drooling just thinking about it.
Yes! I'm going to eat good tonight! Thanks man, here is your payment and a little loot for ya.
Renegade Subcontractor
I have taken over a contract killing for a Renegade.
I've taken on a few too many jobs. You want to take over one of my contracts for me? I'll give you most of the bounty on it.
Thanks. Here's the money I owe you.
Find %s for a UNISG member
I was asked to find %s, by a UNISG member.
Can you do me a huge favour? I'm running low on supplies. Can you help me out?
I'm low on %ss. Come find me if you get your hands on any.
Thanks!
Find a Reliable %s for UNISG
Procure a reliable %s for a UNISG member.
This rifle I was issued is shit. I need one that won't jam on me in every firefight. Can you find a new one for me?
Get me a %s. I'll make it worth your while.
Excellent! She's a beauty. Here, take this for your trouble.
Conflict of Interest
Clean the area where intruders have been sighted. Engage any enemy encountered.
There's a certain group who might pose a risk to our squad's mission. I don't care how, but we want them out of the area. I'm looking for someone who is willing to secure the location.
Perfect! Well done.
Find the "%s" Artefact
A UNISG member is looking for the "%s" artefact.
Are you any good at artefact hunting?

Our clients are studying artefacts, and they need the "%s" artefact. Guess who's the lucky guy that got assigned for this mission? That's right, so do me a favour and find this one. I have a very nice reward I think you'll like.
Finally! You don't know how long I've been searching for this. Here. This is your reward.
Anomalous Study
$comm asked you to help him study an anomaly field, but you need to retrieve the $item_1 you've lost first.
$comm asked you to help him study an anomaly field.\nHead to the marked location.
$comm asked you to help him study an anomaly field.\nUse the $item_1 to take measurements.
$comm asked you to help him study an anomaly field.\nReturn to him with the $item_1 and recorded results.

A part of our job in this place is to study and report anomalous activities. I need someone to study an anomaly field, take measurements and bring back the results. \nI've got the right device for the job, it was designed to endure harsh environmental conditions, and collect accurate data despite the interference. \nWhat do you say?
Wonderful! You saved me big-time. Here, take this.
Collect %s
A Sinner has asked me to collect %s.
The Zone must be purified from the flooding filth. Kill the scum and bring me their uniform patches.
The Zone must be purified from the flooding filth. Kill the scum and bring me their uniform patches.
You have done well, here's your reward.
Redemption
A fellow Monolith warrior was defeated by an infidel. We must help our brothers and bring him down.
Brother, we shall slay the brazen infidel for the good of the Monolith and our cause. Are you willing to help?
You have done well. It is an honour to serve the almighty Monolith alongside with you.
Eliminate Enemy Forces
The enemy has been spotted in the area. Engage the infidels in battle and destroy them to further the cause of Sin.
My brother, we have sighted the enemy in the area. We are going to alert our brothers to prepare for battle. Go there now. The infidels must be purified.
You have done well, my brother.
Cull Mutants for Sin
Cull mutants in the area for Sin.
The mutant population in the area is growing unstable, brother. We must cull their numbers to maintain balance.
You have done well, my brother.
Hunt down the Night Predator
I was asked to help hunt down a dangerous predator that roams at night. Better find it before the day comes.
Yesterday, a night predator was roaming the area. It killed one of our pals, so we are going to hunt that fucker down before it hides in the morning. Do you want to join us?
Phew. That was close... Thanks a lot. Here's your share, have a good one.
Eliminate the Beast
I was asked to help eliminate a dangerous creature that roams at night. Better find it before it comes back to kill more stalkers.

Listen up, stalker. We've been tasked to kill a dangerous night creature, and it must be done tonight, or it will come back later to kill more of our comrades. We can't let that happen. We can use an extra hand if you're willing to help. Join me, and together we can bring the beast down, what do you say?
We did it... Great job, my friend. Please take this, I owe you one.
Find the %s Artefact
A Clear Sky member is offering a reward in exchange for a %s artefact.
Are you any good at artefact hunting?
If you happen to find the "%s" artefact, let me know. I have a very nice reward I think you'll like.
Finally! You don't know how long I've been searching for this. Here. This is your reward.

Find the %s Artefact
A soldier is offering a rifle in exchange for the %s artefact.
Hey, listen, man. I know this is against regulations, but I'm going to be rotating home soon, and I want to bring back a souvenir. You think you can find an artefact for me?
I want to get the "%s" artefact. If you can find me one I'll give you my rifle.
Awesome! Here's what I promised you. Don't let the commander know I have this.
Procure %s
A stalker has a special recipe for preparing mutant meat and needs %s brought to him.
Man, you ever tried mutant meat? A lot of guys won't touch it unless they're starving, but personally I love it. You any good at hunting?
If you can get me a few good cuts of %s, I'll make it worth your while. Mmm... I'm drooling just thinking about it.
Yes! I'm going to eat good tonight! Thank you, stalker. Here is your payment. Oh, and here: I have some ammo that doesn't fit my rifle. You can have it.

I need an experienced stalker or a mutant hunter. Is that somebody you?

Thank you, sir. This will help immensely in our research.

Collect %s
Someone asked me to find and bring %s to him.
My squad is about to head over to other parts of the Zone. Thinking of it, we can always make use of extra equipment for bad days. How about you get us some %ss and I give you something in return?
My squad is about heading over the other parts of the Zone. Thinking of it, we can always make use of extra equipment for bad days.
Oh man! My pals will be happy. Here, take these. You did a nice job.

Collect %s
Someone asked me to find and bring %s to him.

We are currently improving our gear and piling up on supplies to wander more dangerous parts of the Zone to accomplish an important mission. That's why we are looking for supplies crafting kits. Would you by any chance be able to get us a %s? That job will indeed be rewarded stalker.
We are currently improving our gear and piling up on supplies, which is why we need supplies crafting kits.
You did it! These are so rare to across these days, thanks a lot bratan. Here is your reward. You did a nice job stalker.
Procure %s to a Freedomer
A fellow Freedomer asked me to bring him some %s to relief his stress.

Hey bro, do you think you could uh... bring me some uh, some %ss? I'm not an addict you know but uh, I really need those to relief my stress y'know. The Zone is stressful man, I really need that to be less on the edge. Could you help a brother in the need?
Could you bring me some %ss? I really need those to relief my stress y'know. The Zone is stressful man.
Thanks brother!
From Ukraine with Love
An undercover agent needs to be extracted from an enemy squad. Kill the other members of the squad, and escort him back to the base. The spy wields an SVD.

One of our undercover agents infiltrated an enemy faction. However, we're afraid the enemy is growing suspicious of him. He didn't respond to our last few communication attempts, and hasn't sent us any messages either. He's probably being kept under close watch, so he can't afford to fulfil his mission any more. Not to mention that they might get rid of him without waiting for proof. We need to bail him out. We were able to find his location, but it seems he's not alone. Kill the enemy squad, and escort the agent to our base. You can recognise him by his rifle, he wields an SVD. A word of warning: he'll shoot at you when you attack the squad to keep up appearances should things go south, so keep this in mind.
Excellent, I'll have him report at once.
Stop shooting! I'm the spy! Sorry, but I had to do this in case you had bad luck. Let's go back to base now.
This is where we part ways, see you again!
Th-thank you! If you were just a few minutes later, I don't know what would - no, I don't want to think about that. I owe you my life, comrade.
Come with me if you want to live!
Special Order: Collect the Goods
The goods have been delivered; time to collect them from Nimble.
Special order: wait for delivery
The order has been made, so now I should wait for Nimble to get the goods.
Attention! Emission imminent!
Emission imminent, proceed to shelter immediately!
It'd be a death sentence if I left the shelter during an emission.
Emission: Find shelter
Emission: Stay sheltered
Attention!
Radioactive fallout begins.
The level of radiation is dangerous. You should hide from the radioactive fallout.
I shouldn't leave shelter during a radioactive fallout.
Radioactive fallout: find shelter
Radioactive fallout: stay sheltered
Attention!
Radioactive fallout has ended
Attention!
Chemical fallout begins.
The level of contamination is dangerous. You should hide from the chemical fallout.
I shouldn't leave shelter during a chemical fallout.
Chemical fallout: find shelter
Chemical fallout: stay sheltered
Attention!
Chemical fallout has ended
Attention!
Psy-storm begins.
I should hide from the psy-storm.
I shouldn't leave shelter during a psy-storm.
Psy-storm: find shelter
Psy-storm: stay sheltered
Attention!
Psy-storm has ended
Defend the base against mutants
Defend the Ecologist camp against zombified stalkers
Mutants are attacking the base. Help defend it!

Zombified stalkers are attacking the mobile lab. Help defend it! The ongoing emission is not strong enough to cause any harm to you. Search for and use the deployable machine gun on the roof of the mobile lab.
Find %s
I've been tasked to find and bring %s.

Maintaining my medical supplies with the number of injuries I have to treat on a daily basis is difficult. I'm worried I will run out of bandages and medkits sooner or later. I'd like you to bring me one of those old drug-making kits. They will certainly come in handy in the future.
I urgently need a %s. It should contain some tablets and ampoules I need to prepare more medical supplies. I'll pay you for one of those kits if you can bring a full set to me.
Good job. I owe you one.
I have been tasked to find the following items:
, the items must be at least at %s% condition
I will also be paid for the following extra items:
Items to find:
